input: text: "Olympic Games set to take place in Paris with new sports added to the lineup"
validityText:
The input is a string, which satisfies the first requirement of the input specification.

The content of the input appears to pertain to the Olympic Games, which is an international event involving multiple sports. This suggests that the input generally represents a news article related to sports, which satisfies the second requirement of the input specification.

Furthermore, the subject matter of the Olympic Games and the addition of new sports fits naturally into the "Sports" category described in the input specification. This satisfies the final requirement of the input text fitting into one of the categories (World, Sports, Business, Sci/Tech).

Therefore, there are no apparent violations of the input specification.

OK
